channel.title: Thoughts on A Thoughtful Goose
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on A Thoughtful Goose

item.title: A Purpose for Life
item.description: This Isn’t About You So lets start by being clear with what I mean by “purpose of Life”. What I’m referring to is the collective chemical process we call Life, the one that would be observable from an outside perspective if some other beings were studying the Universe one planet at a time and came across Earth. Just like we’re currently hoping to find on exoplanets, they would see evidence of something happening.
